categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: House Paiiri was one of the Ruling Families of the Chiss species, but collapsed around the time of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Chiss Ascendancy's allies, the reconstituted Sith Empire.
House Paiiri was originally intended to be mentioned in a conversation with Aristocra Saganu with Chiss Imperial Agents, but the conversation was cut from the game before release.
